==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Yopia could be derived from the ''Yopi'', also known as ''{{w|Tlapanec_people|Tlapanecs}}''. The Yopi were a culture that inhabited what is now the state of Guerrero, Mexico, and their main city was called Yopitzinco.
